item.title: Colocation Hosting vs Cloud Data Centers
item.description:
By: John Shepler You’ve been managing your own data center for a long time, but your company is expanding, and your server room can no longer keep up. Now you have a decision to make: either rent more space for the extra servers, storage, and other equipment, or think about migrating everything to the cloud. It’s a major choice that demands serious thought before any money is spent. Isnâ€™t Everyone in the Cloud?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/colocation-hosting-vs-cloud-data-centers/
